question: 謙遜
partsOfSpeech: na-adjective, noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: If you have <kanji>modesty</kanji> and are <kanji>humble</kanji>, then you are probably <vocabulary>humble</vocabulary> and have <vocabulary>humility</vocabulary> (and have <vocabulary>modesty</vocabulary> too, I guess).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
